title: Installer fixes
body:
With a little help from my friends I’ve fixed the notorious “missing desktop icon” bug in my installers and updated the script, so now setup.exe checks all optional/selective BINs downloaded and disables checkboxes if no corresponding file(s) found. So now you will see the missing file before “It is not found any file specified for ISArcExtract” error could appear, saving your time.

Changes will appear first in BioShock Remastered.
